"""Test whether prompt answer no works."""
with tmpdir.as_cwd():
    result = cli_runner.invoke(cli, ['submit', '--directory={}'.format(data
        ['analyze-files-gromacs-one-unstarted'])], input='n\n')
    df = pd.read_csv(data['analyze-files-gromacs-prompt.csv'], index_col=0)
    s = PrintDataFrame(df, False)
    output = ('Benchmark Summary:\n' + s +
        """
The above benchmarks will be submitted. Continue? [y/N]: n
""" +
        'ERROR Exiting. No benchmarks submitted.\n')
    assert result.exit_code == 1
    assert result.output == output
